m_szDocSumamry: Coverage of Disruptive Science and Technology Forum About Contact Facebook twitter Google March 19, 2016 Trump is on a clear path to the Republican nomination but Republican leaders preparing a 100 day political guerrilla war future, politics, prediction, united states Facebook Twitter linkedin google Reddit Trump still needs to win most of the remaining delegates to avoid a contested convention. However, an analysis where Trump maintains his current level of support has him winning enough delegates for the Republican nomination. The polling of the upcoming contests shows Trump with significan
